name: Samuel S. LYNESS, M.D., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, STATE BOARD OF MEDICINE

parties: Samuel S. LYNESS, M.D., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, STATE BOARD OF MEDICINE.

opinions.text:
ORDER:
PER CURIAM.
AND NOW, this 15th day of October, 1990, it is hereby ordered that the Petition for Allowance of Appeal is granted as to Issue # 1 only. The Petition for Allowance of Appeal is otherwise denied.
opinions.author: PER CURIAM.

casebody.head_matter:
581 A.2d 928
Samuel S. LYNESS, M.D., Petitioner, v. COMMONWEALTH of Pennsylvania, STATE BOARD OF MEDICINE.
Supreme Court of Pennsylvania.
Oct. 15, 1990.
